title: T206 Stars, SL, Commons, & Shag's FOR SALE
author: iggyman

posts.post_title: T206 Stars, SL, Commons, & Shag's FOR SALE
posts.post_content:
Hot off the press, I have the following T206 cards for sale. Some graded, some not.  All prices include a bubble envelope, plus I will have a mailman (or if you prefer a women) personally deliver the card(s) to your doorstep for free (can't beat that)! Check, money order, or paypal all work for me. Thanks for looking! My email is [url]agonzdude@yahoo.com[/url] .  

Here are the pics with prices:

[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157625869541510/detail/[/url] Stars, Shag's, & Lundgren (raw and graded)

[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157625744135711/detail/[/url] SGC Graded Stars (graded authentic, but all with fantastic eye appeal (no creases))

[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157625744024331/detail/[/url] Graded commons (majority graded 1 with back damage but nice eye appeal on the front).......

all SL sold....[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157625870684214/detail/[/url] RAW Southern Leaguers mostly lower grade ALL are GONE...

all raw commons have been sold...[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157625743702605/detail/[/url] Raw commons, all with fantastic eye appeal but I've deemed them all trimmed or your money back sold


Lovely Day...
